title: 11 rp
body: Its not that big of a deal still have some time but wanted to make sure, there isn't some stupid way to make or reward small amount of RP from recruit a friend or something is there. But just a bit off on a skt skin

replies.body: I think we can work something out.  :)  Draw me a poro enjoying the autumn season, and the poros might be thrilled enough to help.  :D
I got this Poroumkin on the way https://imgur.com/a/Swn3U     >.<
Omg I LOVE IT.  He's a great poro pumpkin king!  The RP has been added to your account, thanks for the drawing!
Thanks magical poro's for the help able to pick up the SKT T1 Zed skin :D
